official_title: A bill to place the position of Director of the Office of Management and Budget, in level I of the executive schedule under section 5312 of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Places the position of Director of the Office of Management and Budget in level I of the Executive Schedule. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5312)

titles.title: A bill to place the position of Director of the Office of Management and Budget, in level I of the executive schedule under section 5312 of title 5, United States Code.
